comments.body:
I started going down that route but didn't want to require TS 4.3 to support this, so reverted to the 'light touch' approach even though it isn't a perfect fit. I'm not quite sure how to handle this correctly prior to TS 4.3.

Are you suggesting that we define 'typesVersions', fork the definitions to support ts3.6 and then rework settings in the newer version, or is there another technique to achieve this?
